intro: An escape room inspired adventure. Unravel the mystery, or risk becoming another forgotten part of Project 7.
description:
Eighteen months have passed since the mysterious disappearance of renowned inventor and physicist Dr. Hillman. Whispers of his secret experiment, known only as Project 7, still echo through the halls of his abandoned mansion. Intrigued by the mystery, you decide to spend a night at the mansion, unaware of what awaits you.

Woken in the dead of night, you find yourself trapped in your room. Your only way out is to dig deeper into the mansion’s secrets, solving intricate puzzles and deciphering the mysterious notes left by Dr. Hillman. Each discovery pulls you closer to the truth behind Project 7.

About

Project 7 is a first-person 3D escape room puzzle adventure, inspired by classic 90s titles and modern virtual escape rooms. Explore an immersive indoor world, collect and use items you find along the way, solve puzzles, and escape the rooms.

Play as an investigator looking into the disappearance of a physicist working on a top secret experiment called Project 7. Explore the mansion, study your surroundings, and use all your puzzle-solving skills to discover the secret of Project 7.

Every puzzle has a logical solution. Take your time, there is no rush. Enjoy figuring out what you need to do.

Features

• Explore an immersive 3D mansion, solve puzzles, and collect items
• Physics-based interactions, pick up, rotate, and move objects
• Original 3D visuals, rich environments, and atmosphere to explore
• Immersive soundtrack and effects that pull you into the adventure
